Recently I bought a WWII Officer's Katana. I've been trying to do 
research=
 on it and I'm a little puzzled. The Tsuba has 4 or 5 
swastikas (can't rem=
ember how many exactly) carved into the Tsuba. I 
found out that swastikas =
are buddhist symbols as well as what Hitler 
used them for. There are desig=
ns of painted fish on the scabbard as 
well as the handle. Which are also b=
uddhist symbols. Has anyone else 
ever seen Katanas decorated with swastika=
s? I was just wondering if 
someone might have any background info. Any hel=
p would be great. 
Please e-mail me back with any info.
